title: Gym Etiquette 101
description: Gym Etiquette 101 is a beginner's guide to feeling comfortable with the idea of exercising in a gym. Then, the book leads the reader to take that idea to the next level by applying it to their own exercise program. Starting a new fitness routine can be intimidating when surrounded by experienced exercise enthusiasts. Through 10 helpful tips, space for the reader to make notes, personal stories and fitness facts, the book eliminates the intimidation factor. Because a gym is much like an adult playground, it's important to know how to get along with others in the proverbial sandbox.
author: Kim Becknell Williams
